info.name: Cleaner Gmail
info.description: For the default theme (as of 2/8/12), this user style increases the height of each row of emails and widens the scroll bar to the right of these rows.
info.additionalInfo:
Version 1.0

Notes:

Applies only to URLs that start with https://mail.google.com/

And knowing Google, this may not work long, so feel free to improve!
